p: During intubation special precautions are required. An professional operator who uses personal protective equipments (PPE) such as protective goggles, disposable double socks, disposable gloves, FFP 3 or N 95 mask and disposable gown long sleeve raincoat can conduct the operation. The rapid sequence intubation (RSI) should be performed if possible. The preoxygenation (100% O 2) should be performed for 5 minutes using the method of continuous positive airway pressure (CPAP). Heat and moisture exchanger (HME) must be located between the circuit of fan and mask or between the ventilation balloon and the mask.
